description:
Course Contents

Learning Apache Maven will help out to understand Software Project Life-cycle phases and build system. As java projects requires lot of dependencies to be managed, Apache Maven knowledge will make you effective at delivering Java Based Application.

This course contains below mentioned.

1. What is Maven and Why to use Maven?

2. Build Lifecycle Phases

3. Dependency Management

4. Creating Maven Based Java Projects

5. Maven Plugins - Executable Jar Files

6. Maven Resource (Including / excluding)

6. Maven Plugins, Profiles and Modules

Audiance

Anyone who wish to learn Java program build cycle.

Materials

This course is having videos, presentation, test papers and hand-outs to download.

Structure

Course is structured to various sections and each section having videos, hand-outs and execercise to perform.
title: Learn Maven
